sections.title: 1. Find the Tool You Need
sections.content: Welcome to 'Useful Apps Collection'! We offer a variety of calculation and conversion tools to help with your daily life and work. Start by finding the tool you need on the homepage or the apps list page. Tools are categorized for easy browsing, and you can use the search function to find what you're looking for quickly.

sections.title: 2. Easy Input and Real-Time Calculations
sections.content: Once you've found the tool you want, simply input the necessary information. For many tools, the results are displayed automatically in real-time as you enter numbers or select options. The design is intuitive, requiring no complex operations.

sections.title: 3. Utilize the Calculation Results
sections.content: You can easily copy the calculation results to your clipboard with a single click of the copy button. This is convenient for sharing results with friends and colleagues or for pasting them into other applications. Some tools may offer additional features for sharing results.

sections.title: 4. Convenient Auto-Save Feature
sections.content: The values you last entered are automatically saved in your browser. This allows your previous inputs to be restored when you use the same tool next time, enabling you to resume your work smoothly. Your privacy is protected, and this data is never sent externally.

sections.title: 5. Eye-Friendly Dark Mode
sections.content: We offer a dark mode to reduce eye strain during prolonged use. You can switch between light and dark modes at any time by clicking the switch in the top-right corner of the site. Enjoy using the site with your preferred display theme.

sections.title: 6. Global-Ready Multilingual Support
sections.content: Our site supports multiple languages to be accessible to users worldwide. Please select your preferred language from the language switcher in the header. We plan to add more supported languages in the future.
